channel.title: Heylo Online - Updated 09/02/09
channel.description:
Development of Heylo
About Heylo, I first came across the idea when i saw supra s's crezzur topic, Thats what gave me the idea, I am going to base this of halo so am going to need help thinking of what npc's to have and other thing's i am hoping to add the gun's so that they will shoot arrows thats about it for now [hr] REQUESTING A SUITABLE GAMEFRAME:
If Anybody could make me a suitable gameframe for my client i would be more than happy and will give you cred's in the credits part (see client main page) [hr] REQUESTING ITEMS:
If you have any gun's such as bazooka's, sniper rifle's, or just normal gun's and armour like the master cheif please feel free to share with us!
Why do we need models? because i cant make them i suck :P
What will we give you? You will be credited on our site and if u give us 3 or more model's you will get mod or 7 or more u will get admin these will not be called this though they will be called
[ul][li]Moderators = Marine[/li] [li]Administrator = Arbiter[/li] [li]Owner's =Master Cheif[/li][/ul]
[hr] post your models in MQO, u can send them to us -> - On this topic - Private message - Or to my email - Gs_pk_pure@project2k9.com [hr] [u]What we currently have[/u]
[ul][li]We currently have a completely blank Server source and server client that we will be adding updates too[/li] [li]3 Soundtrack's from the "halo" Game [/li] [li]Finished client exept from models...[/li][/ul]
[u]Future updates[/u] In the next week or so i hope to have a full website and atleast 10 wepons and a full npc list
[u]Help Please[/u] Hello can somebody please tell me how to remove skill's from the server and client such as Farming and other stuff [hr]
Client Picture's Loading screen [img]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Haxor0002-1.png[/img]
Gameplay - See the gameframe sucks so we need a new one [img]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww189/gs_pk_pure/Haxor0001-1.png[/img]
*note this is not the source it is my Project 2k9 v1 that i found lying around on my pc*
[u]Current Coder's/Designers[/u]
[ul][li]Gs Pk Pure[/li] [li]Cookie Guru[/li] [li]Teh_Desire[/li][/ul]
Thank-you for your time Hope you can help me

Development of Heylo

About Heylo,
I first came across the idea when i saw supra s’s crezzur topic, Thats what gave me the idea, I am going to base this of halo so am going to need help thinking of what npc’s to have and other thing’s i am hoping to add the gun’s so that they will shoot arrows thats about it for now
